context.help: This level is used to control the general configuration of the Collaboration web application.

option.name: cgc.config.key.webrtc.enabled
option.help: This enables or disables the WebRTC. Default is true

option.name: cgc.config.key.webrtc.video.enabled
option.help: This enables or disables the WebRTC Video. Default is true

option.name: cgc.config.key.inBandDTMFSupport.enabled
option.help: This activate or deactivates sending the Conference Id in the To field of the SIP header while dialing the room. Default is false

option.name: cgc.config.key.callmenow.enabled
option.help: This enables or disables the call me conference. Default is true

option.name: cgc.config.key.boshUrlList
option.help: This is the compete bosh url with http(s)://server:port/. If provided then no lookup will up happen on the domain of the guest client for bosh URl Default is true

option.name: cgc.config.key.custom.resourcepath
option.help: Specifies the absolute path in the XSP to keep custom resources for localization and branding like language files, images, css

option.name: cgc.config.key.globalTransactionLimitPeriodInSeconds
option.help: This parameter specifies the time period in seconds which is used to check the allowed number of requests to the application in this period. Default is 30 seconds.

option.name: cgc.config.key.globalTransactionLimit
option.help: This parameter specifies the allowed number of requests to the application during the time period specified with globalTransationLimitPeriodInSeconds. Default is 1000.

option.name: cgc.config.key.leaderAcceptanceTimeOutInSeconds
option.help: This parameter specifies the maximum time in seconds for leader's acceptance to the guest join request. Default is 60 in seconds.

option.name: cgc.config.key.allowHttp
option.help: Specifies if CGC is accessible over non-secured HTTP. Default is true.

option.name: cgc.config.key.sslServerPort
option.help: Specifies the port configured for http ssl in the XSP. Default is 443.

context.help: This level is used to enable and disable the captcha and other related parameters like private and public keys.

option.name: cgc.config.key.captcha.disabled
option.help: This disables or enables the Captcha authentication support in the application. Default is false

option.name: cgc.config.key.recaptchapublickey
option.help: This parameter specifies the public key to be used with ReCaptcha authentication

option.name: cgc.config.key.recaptchaprivatekey
option.help: This parameter specifies the private key to be used with ReCaptcha authentication

context.help: This level is used to control the general configuration of the Collaboration web application.

option.name: httpclient.socket.connection.timeout
option.help: Specifies generic timeout in millisconds for http socket. Default is 60000.

option.name: httpclient.connection.max
option.help: Specifies the maximum number of connections for http communication to web application like Xsi-Actions allowed overall. Default is 200.

context.help: This level is used to customize the XSP(Broadworks) integration related configurations for the application.

option.name: provisioning.adapter.url
option.help: Specifies the http scheme as http or https to access the Provisioning Adapter web application. Default is http.

option.name: provisioning.adapter.admin
option.help: Specifies the Admin name to access PA.

option.name: provisioning.adapter.admin.password
option.help: Specifies the Admin password to access PA

option.name: httpclient.allowselfsignedcerts
option.help: This allows or restricts the usage of self signed certificates for the URL. Default is true

context.help: This level is used to customize the XSP(Broadworks) integration related configurations for the application.

option.name: bwConnection.ocic.usePersistentConnections
option.help: This parameter is used to turn the Execution Server discovery module on and off, and defaults to "false". When persistent connections are disabled, the discovery module is disabled (not running).

option.name: bwConnection.ocic.discoveryPeriod
option.help: It controls the number of seconds between each poll when the Execution Server discovery module is enabled. Default is 60 seconds and the range is between 1 to 3600 seconds.

option.name: bwConnection.ocic.application
option.help: This parameter is used to customize the ocic application Id of the application. OCIC application Id is mandatory for the application for making oci-c request to ApplicationServer. Default is Collaborate Guest Client

option.name: bwIntegration.mode
option.help: Specifies the mode, which is either AS for an Application Server or NS for a Network Server. Default is 'AS'.

context.help: This level is used to control AS and NS Address related attributes for BroadWorks Integration. Any one of AS or NS address must be provided.

option.name: bwIntegration.seed.nsClusterAddress
option.help: Specifies the Network Server(NS) IP address, host or domain.

option.name: bwIntegration.seed.asPrimaryAddress
option.help: Specifies the primary Application server's (AS) IP address, host or domain.

option.name: bwIntegration.seed.asSecondaryAddress
option.help: Specifies the secondary Application server's (AS) IP address, host or domain.

option.name: bwIntegration.seed.ocicPort
option.help: Specifies the Application Server OCI-C (to the Provisioning Server process) plain tcp/ip listening port. Default is 2220.

context.help: This level is used to control the WRS client configuration for Collaboration Guest Client.

option.name: wrs.address.list
option.help: Denotes the list of Addresses for WRS server

option.name: wrs.domain.to
option.help: Configures domainTo address for WRS client configuration

option.name: wrs.domain.from
option.help: Configures domainFrom address for WRS client configuration

option.name: wrs.stun.server
option.help: Configures stunServer address for WRS client configuration

option.name: wrs.stunserver.port
option.help: Configures stunPort address for WRS client configuration

context.help: This level is used to control the Chrome related configuration of the Collaboration web application.

option.name: chrome.desktopShare.extensionId
option.help: This parameter specifies the Item ID of the Communicator Guest client share extension published in the Chrome webstore.
